mapper.select: select code from inno72_coupon where id = ( select prize_id from inno72_activity_plan_game_result where prize_type = 2 and activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId} and result_code = #{report} limit 1 )
select * from inno72_activity_plan where activity_id in (select id from inno72_activity where is_default = 1)

select pm.activity_plan_id from inno72_activity_plan_machine pm join inno72_activity_plan plan on pm.activity_plan_id=plan.id where pm.machine_id=#{mid} and (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() BETWEEN plan.start_time AND plan.end_time) and plan.is_delete=0
